DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether snack differ fat amount type result change cardiovascular disease risk factor men woman mildly elevate cholesterol level . Our hypothesis diet contain snack rich polyunsaturated fat lead favorable cardiovascular disease risk profile diet contain snack rich saturate trans fat one contain low-fat snack .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Various Higher Fat Lower Fat Snacks Cardiovascular Risk Factors Men Women .
DOC.detailed_description: The overall goal study determine whether snack food rich polyunsaturated fat ( PUFA ) produce beneficial effect cardiovascular disease risk compare snack rich saturate fat ( SFA ) trans fats snack rich refine carbohydrate . The primary objective study determine effect substitute n-6 PUFA ( linoleic acid ) snack chip SFA/trans fat refine carbohydrate serum lipid -principally LDL-C - lipoproteins moderately hypercholesterolemic men woman . A secondary objective ass effect lipoprotein subclass particle size , intramyocellular lipid , C-reactive protein ( CRP ) . Forty-two men woman recruit participate randomize , crossover , control feeding experiment 3 period 4 week . Each feed phase separate 8-week washout period . The control diet National Cholesterol Education Program Step 1 diet consist approximately 30 % energy total fat , < 10 % energy SFA , 5 % energy PUFA , 15 % energy monounsaturated fatty acid ( MUFA ) , 1 % energy trans fat , 55 % energy carbohydrate , 15 % energy protein . To achieve isocaloric substitution PUFA , 300 kcal come low-fat , high-carbohydrate snack remove Step 1 diet ( NCEP diet ) replace 300 kcal PUFA-rich snack ( LO diet ) . Similarly , 300 kcal snack rich SFA/trans fat replace 300 kcal high-carbohydrate Step 1 diet high SFA diet ( SF diet ) . Subjects consume food provide GCRC nothing else feed phase . Breakfast lunch meal consume GCRC weekday breakfast Saturdays . All meal pack consume home . The primary study variable serum/plasma LDL-cholesterol . Secondary variable include lipid lipoprotein include total cholesterol ( TC ) , HDL-cholesterol , VLDL-cholesterol , triglyceride , intramyocellular lipid . Exploratory variable include assessment lipid subclass particle size CRP , marker systemic inflammation . Supportive variable include fast blood glucose insulin , percent body fat mass , blood pressure demographic information . All variable measure baseline endpoint feed phase .
DOC.criteria: age 1965 body mass index 2035 weight stable least 3 month lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol 130180 mg/dL triglyceride < 150 mg/dL glucose < 126 mg/dL smoker type 1 diabetes type 2 diabetes use lipidlowering medication hypertension pregnancy lactation plan become pregnant period study
